Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-32149 affecting package prometheus-adapter for versions less than 0.10.0-14
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-32149 affecting package prometheus-adapter for versions less than 0.10.0-14. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package prometheus-adapter is earlier than 0.10.0-14, affected by CVE-2022-32149
